title: The Gary Null Show
content:
Guest: Keith Fitz-Gerald

Keith Fitz-Gerald is the Chief Investment Strategist for Money Map Press which publishes... <!--more--> Money Morning specializing in global markets.
 A former professional trade advisor on global futures trading adn hedging, he was a founding fellow of the Kenos Circle in Vienna Austria, an economic think that looking at financial trends.
 Aside from Money Morning, Keith is also the editor of three investment services: The New China Trader, The Geiger Index, and the MicroQuake Alert.
 In 2010, Forbes magazine named him a “business visionary” and he is the author of “Fiscal Hangover: How to Profit from the New Global Economy.”

www.KeithFitz-Gerald.com AND www.MoneyMorning.com
